sys_ui_page.description: This UI Page will be used to remove all the objects linked to an Assessment.
sys_ui_page.html:
var tableName = RP.getWindowProperties().table_name; var activate = RP.getWindowProperties().activate; var published = RP.getWindowProperties().published; var currentSysId = RP.getWindowProperties().current_sys_id; var bodyMsg = new CIRAssmtModel().GetActivateDeactivateAssessmentMessage(tableName, published === 'true', activate === 'true');

${bodyMsg}
sys_ui_page.name: activate_deactivate_assessment_objects
sys_ui_page.processing_script: var activateMessage = new CIRAssmtModel().ActivateAssessmentObject(tableName, currentSysId, activate === 'true', published === 'true'); response.sendRedirect(tableName + '.do?sys_id=' + currentSysId);
